title: In the Eyes of Mr Fury
description: The day Concord Webster turned eighteen, the devil died. - The devil's real name was Judge Martin, but Concord's mother had always told him that he was the devil. She called his house Hades and said that he kept bats and snakes in his bedroom. But how did she know? Read this book for yourself to find out why it has become a cult classic.
author: Philip Ridley
